animeTitle: Dogs: Stray Dogs Howling in the Dark
otherNames: Dogs: Bullets & Carnage, ドッグズ／バレッツ＆カーネイジ
synopsis: The story takes place in a future European city where Mihai Mihaeroff — a former assassin, Badou Nails — a chain-smoking one-eyed mercenary, Fuyumine Naoto — a katana-wielding female orphan, and Heine Rammsteiner — a genetically altered albino gunman, ply their deadly trades on the streets and in the underground.
